meanings.definition: The side of a pavement or road, typically marked by a curb.
meanings.sent1: The children played hopscotch on the curbsides.
meanings.sent2: Cars lined up neatly along the curbsides of the busy street.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel balanced on the curbsides, pretending to be a tightrope walker.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts wandered freely, drifting along the curbsides of memories.
meanings.sent5: The flowers bloomed brightly along the curbsides, adding color to the street.

meanings.definition: The area alongside a street or road where vehicles can park.
meanings.sent1: We found a parking spot right by the curbsides of the restaurant.
meanings.sent2: The delivery truck stopped by the curbsides to unload the packages.
meanings.sent3: The cat napped lazily on the warm curbsides, enjoying the sun.
meanings.sent4: His dreams parked themselves by the curbsides of reality, waiting to be explored.
meanings.sent5: The bustling city hummed with life along the curbsides, a constant flow of activity.
